title: DoYou Yoga: Gamified UX Redesign
problemStatement: Lack of visual hierarchy in 'Challenges' leading to user decision paralysis.
Outdated aesthetic and inconsistent color palette that didn't align with 'Zen' brand values.
No incentive or feedback loop to encourage daily user consistency.
solutions: Redesigned the Discovery architecture with a categorized 'Card System' to improve content scannability.
Developed a 'Zen-State' design system with a cohesive color palette focused on accessibility and calm.
Introduced a Milestone & Streak system to provide immediate positive reinforcement for daily activity.
results: Increased user retention by creating a rewarding feedback loop through gamification.
Established a modern, accessible design system that scales across mobile and web.
Reduced cognitive load by simplifying the 'Challenge Discovery' interface.
Significant reduction in user friction reflected in a 60% faster enrollment speed.

metrics.label: User Engagement
metrics.description: Increase in Daily Active Users (DAU) through gamification.

metrics.label: Enrollment Speed
metrics.description: Reduced clicks to start a program from 5 to 2.

metrics.label: Visual Satisfaction
metrics.description: Positive feedback on the new 'Zen' color palette.
